Sentence: We show that, in vitro, Pellino 1 can combine with the E2 conjugating complex Ubc13 ( ubiquitin - conjugating enzyme 13) - Uev1a ( ubiquitin E2 variant 1a) to catalyse the formation of K63 - pUb ( Lys63 - linked polyubiquitin) chains, with UbcH3 to catalyse the formation of K48 - pUb chains and with UbcH4, UbcH5a or UbcH5b to catalyse the formation of pUb - chains linked mainly via Lys11 and Lys48 of ubiquitin.
